The '''Lightning Release: Snake Lightning''' technique allows the user to generate a discharge of yellow electricity from their hand, which can electrocute a target by either emitting it around the user's body while they're submerged in water,<ref>''Boruto'' episode 6</ref> thrusting it into a target,<ref>''Boruto'' episode 37</ref> or manifesting a snake from the concentrated chakra to attack from a distance.
